  <title>Niepołomice Forest GEDI L2A measurements with calculated ALS point cloud reference metrics</title>
  <abstract>This GeoPackage file contains polygons representing GEDI measurement footprints on the ground, which were used as study area in the "How to get closer to actual forest stand height using GEDI? A case study in central European Scots pine stands" paper, authored by Wojciech Krawczyk and Piotr Wężyk, published in European Journal of Remote Sensing (https://doi.org/10.1080/22797254.2024.2399209). 

The dataset consists of GEDI measurements located in Niepołomice Forest study area. It was created following methodology described in the aforementioned paper, for more information refer to "Methods" section of the paper.</abstract>
